scenario_text.value:
How’d you like that, losers?! Go on, say
something! Er, guess they’re gone already.
...You lost it again, didn’t you, Kaito?!

I don’t know what is wrong with you! What if
you’d gotten hurt?!

Miu? Am I hearing things? I could’ve sworn
you just said...

Thank you. You heard right. I’m glad you kept
me safe.

Yeah...you’re welcome. You know, you’re being
super cute right now.

Ugh, gross! I don’t want to hear that from my
brother! No, it’s gross no matter what!
Haha, well I’m really glad you’re both okay.
Of course! And thanks for showing up, Takuma.
I’m gonna help out from now on, too!
